  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_79067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Periodic table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periodische Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Table périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabela periódica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabella periodica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοδικός πίνακας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vector periódico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of two illustration showing the periodic table of elements. Here, the different types of chlorides formed by these elements are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">complex chlorides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent chlorides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic chlorides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">periodic table</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist an zweiter Stelle von der Abbildung 
zwei, welche die periodische Tabelle der Elemente zeigt. Hier 
werden die unterschiedlichen Typen der Chlorverbindungen, die durch 
diese Elemente gebildet werden, angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de l'illustration deux 
montrant la table périodique des éléments. Ici, les 
différents types de chlorures constitués par ces éléments sont 
indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo da ilustração dois que 
mostra a tabela periódica dos elementos. Aqui, os tipos 
diferentes de cloretos dados forma por estes elementos são indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo dell'illustrazione due 
che mostra la tabella periodica degli elementi. Qui, i tipi 
differenti di cloruri costituiti da questi elementi sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη της απεικόνισης δύο που εμφανίζει
περιοδικό πίνακα των στοιχείων. Εδώ, οι διαφορετικοί τύποι
χλωριδίων που διαμορφώνονται από αυτά τα στοιχεία είναι 
υποδειγμένοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de la ilustración dos
que muestra el vector periódico de elementos. Aquí, los 
diversos tipos de cloruros formados por estos elementos se indican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Elemente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">komplizierte Chlorverbindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kovalente Chlorverbindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionenchlorverbindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Tabelle</string>
          </keyword>
